abstract.p: Correction of picture caption with Oct 20 obituary of Art Coulter

block.p: A picture on Friday with an obituary of Art Coulter, a former National Hockey League player, was misidentified by The Associated Press and published in error. It showed Murray (Muzz) Patrick, Mr. Coulter's New York Ranger teammate. The obituary also omitted four survivors. In addition to Mr. Coulter's brother, Tom, of Chicago, he is survived by a son, Art, of Miami; a daughter, Patricia Mundy, of Metuchen, N.J.; and two grandchildren.
